game.name: PROJECT: Melee Only
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as a Soul Extractor and fight your way to the highest Stage possible. Keep your level and your EXP and start again stronger, no maximum level, no maximum stage. Reach the highest stage you can get.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as a Soul Extractor and fight your way to the highest Stage possible. Keep your level and your EXP and start again stronger, no maximum level, no maximum stage. Reach the highest stage you can get.
